title: Fullstackutvecklare
description:
*Tycker du också det är spännande med utveckling i .NET och React.js och har ett hjärta som slår för samhällsförändring? Då är den här tjänsten något för dig!*


**Vad gör vi?**

Vi på Decerno är specialister på skräddarsydda digitala lösningar och är stolta över att våra uppdrag bidrar till samhällsnytta.


Det betyder att vi förstår att alla kunder är olika och har unika förutsättningar. Vi skräddarsyr våra lösningar utefter kundens behov vilket medför att vi kan erbjuda våra medarbetare ett smörgåsbord av spännande projekt och tekniker.


Samtidigt som vi skapar digitala lösningar vill vi också göra skillnad på riktigt. Det är inte bara något vi säger, vi menar det! Sedan vår start 1984 har vår etiska policy varit vår kompass och vi väljer aktivt bort projekt inom vapenindustri, spel, tobak och alkohol.


**Om rollen**


Som utvecklare hos oss kommer får du en varierad vardag och möjlighet att jobba inom (men inte uteslutande med):


* Utveckling, främst i React, .NET/C#, SQL eller Azure

Vi lägger stor vikt vid att bemanna våra projekt med Decernos egna anställda och tillsammans delar ni med er av olika erfarenheter och hjälper varandra genom projektets alla faser.  

  



Tjänsten är placerad på vårt kontor i Stockholm med möjlighet att arbeta på distans när det passar. Vi tror på att kunna erbjuda våra medarbetare stor flexibilitet och möjligheten att balansera egna behov och förutsättningar med projektets krav. Vissa projekt kan dock kräva en viss fysisk närvaro för att bygga starka relationer med våra kunder och lära känna deras verksamhet på bästa sätt.


**Är det här du?**


* Du har ett intresse för fullstackutveckling
* Du har minst **5 års** erfarenhet av **C#/.NET** och **React.js** eller **Typescript**
* Du är flytande i svenska i såväl tal som skrift
* Du har en högskoleutbildning eller erfarenhet som motsvarar utbildningen

Det är meriterande om du har tidigare erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med Azure, DevOps, integrationer, .NET web API, CSS, AI eller maskininlärning. Vi ser också gärna att du har tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta i team och kommunicerar enkelt och ärligt med dina kollegor.


**Därför ska du välja** **Decerno**

I våra medarbetarundersökningar blir det gång på gång tydligt att det är de fantastiska kollegorna, de roliga och utmanande projekten och möjligheten att kunna bidra till samhällsnytta som gör att våra medarbetare trivs så bra på Decerno.


Sedan finns det också några ytterligare aspekter vilka vi ser som självklarheter:


* En flexibel arbetsplats med större frihet att planera vardagen för att få arbete och privatliv att gå ihop
* Extra föräldraförmåner eftersom vi tycker att familjen är viktigast
* Vi tycker att din kompetensutveckling är viktig! Därför anordnar vi interna utbildningar löpande i vår egen Dec Academy, gör satsningar inom AI, håller i bokcirklar och arrangerar årliga konferenser
* Vi vill att du ska må bra, trivas och ha roligt på arbetet och därför arrangerar vi regelbundet olika sociala aktiviteter, utmaningar och hälsotävlingar – såväl virtuellt som på plats

Utöver detta erbjuder vi även ett brett förmånspaket som inkluderar bland annat friskvårdsbidrag och ett generöst försäkringspaket. Vi berättar gärna mer om du vill veta vad mer vi på Decerno skulle kunna erbjuda dig.


**Låter detta som ditt nästa steg i karriären?**


Vad kul! Då ser vi fram emot att läsa din ansökan så snart som möjligt.


Vid frågor är du välkommen att kontakta HR-generalist på **klara.zetterberg@decerno.se**.


Vi ser fram emot att höra hur vi kan bli ditt nästa steg i karriären!

title: PEGA developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Ensure the scalability and performance of Pega applications through effective architecture design
* Create and implement complicated workflows, decision techniques and interactions with external systems
* Identify, build and maintain common components
* Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product and databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality.
* Provides architecture and design guidance to project teams
* Interact with Business Stakeholders, Product Owners and QA team
* Provide directions and guidance to team members on using the latest Pega studios and tools
* Support in scoping and sizing Pega features

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* Minimum 8+ years of experience in Pega PRPC development
* Minimum 2+ years of experience in the role of the Pega Lead System Architect
* Project experience implemented in Pega infinity
* Pega Certified Lead System Architect (CLSA) certification
* Hands-on Pega development experience in Constellation configuration (financial sector will be an asset)
* Experience in architecture designing for large Pega solutions
* Experience in integrating enterprise applications with the Pega solutions
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Fluency in English

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 08-01-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Join K3’s Cloud Team as our New AWS Architect / Developer
description:
Are you a self-proclaimed cloud nerd who can’t wait to explore the latest AWS innovations? Do you love solving complex problems and sharing your knowledge with others? Then we want **you** to join our Cloud unit at K3!

##### **What We’re Looking For:**

* Deep AWS Expertise


You stay ahead of the curve on AWS services. You’re comfortable using IaC (CloudFormation, CDK, Terraform), the AWS SDK, and you’re just as excited to learn what’s new in 2025 as you were on Day One.

* Strong Backend Chops


You understand how to design, build, and maintain robust backend systems that scale. If you’ve built serverless architectures, worked with containers, or dabbled in microservices—awesome!

* Secure & Compliant by Default


Because security is paramount, you have experience or interest in AWS Control Tower, Security Hub, GuardDuty, AWS Organization, and other core governance tools to keep our environments safe and sound.

* Automation-Driven


You don’t like repeating tasks. Instead, you automate everything—CI/CD pipelines, event driven architecture, and even self-healing infrastructure. Tools like AWS Lambda, Step Functions, and StackSets are in your toolkit.

* Problem-Solving Mindset


You see potential solutions where others see roadblocks. Finding neat and elegant ways to tackle challenging technical puzzles is your jam.

 **Who You Are**


1. **Passionate About Cloud**


You actively keep up with the latest AWS releases, from serverless breakthroughs to AI/ML integrations, and you’re excited to apply them in real-world scenarios.


2. **Structured & Organized**


You plan carefully, write clear documentation, and keep your code easily maintainable by others.


3. **Community-Oriented Nerd**


You enjoy sharing knowledge—whether that’s mentoring junior developers, speaking at meetups, or contributing to open source projects. You believe collaboration is the key to success.


4. **Eager to Learn & Grow**


2025 means new AWS services, patterns, and best practices are emerging at lightning speed. You’re dedicated to continuous learning and adapting to the future of cloud technologies.

 **What do we offer at K3?**

* A unique opportunity to be part of our new initiative from the very start.
* Room for creativity and innovation, allowing you to influence the company’s technical direction at an early stage.
* A culture of openness, respect, and collaboration where every voice is heard and encouraged.
* Strong teammates – We’re building a team of dedicated, skilled professionals who share your passion for technology. We believe in collaboration, knowledge-sharing, and a positive work environment where every individual’s contribution leads to success.
* Flexible working hours and the possibility to work remotely, promoting a healthy work-life balance.
* A competitive salary and benefits package.
* Ongoing training and certification in relevant technical areas.
* The chance to work with the latest technologies and contribute to innovative solutions.

 **Ready to help us shape the future of cloud?**


Apply today and let’s build something awesome together at K3! Send your resume and a brief note about why you’re the perfect AWS Architect/Developer to our Head Of Cloud Services, patrik.lagertrad@k3nordic.com

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**Fullstack Developer**
-----------------------

**About Wehype:**


At Wehype, we empower creators and game publishers to thrive through creator collaborations. Our platform has facilitated over 20,000 successful activations globally, including paid sponsorships, Support A Creator Codes, and exclusive giveaways, driving millions of impressions and boosting brand engagement. We work with some of the world’s biggest publishers, such as Tencent, Blizzard, and Supercell, to create impactful campaigns that connect creators with games on a global scale.

**Play your part in our team's succeeding**


We're seeking a hungry, energetic, and proactive Fullstack Developer who loves to make things happen. You thrive on exploring the latest technologies, leveraging AI to accelerate results, and experimenting with your own projects.


As a Fullstack Developer at Wehype, you'll play an integral role in building and optimizing our platform using a suite of technologies such as SvelteKit, GraphQL and .NET among others. You'll work in one of our cross-functional teams to design and implement robust, scalable solutions that empower our users and contribute to our growth. From architecting new features to optimizing performance, you'll have the opportunity to make a meaningful impact every day.

**Requirements**


* You are an ambitious developer who loves to jump on new projects
* Interested in new technologies and explore new technical solutions
* Experience in one or more modern programming languages, preferably C# and Typescript
* Experience with agile product development, from brainstorming concepts to implementation
* Experience in databases, relational and NoSQL
* Strong problem-solving and communication skills, with the ability to work in a collaborative environment

**It would be nice to add on with**

* Experience interacting with AI
* Familiarity with DevOps and/or automated testing
* Experience working with Microsoft SQL Server, MongoDB and/or Amazon Redshift
* Knowledge of cloud computing platforms, preferably AWS
* An interest in system design and architecture
* Experience in the .NET environment

**What’s in it for you?**


* Growth Opportunities: Learn as part of a collaborative team and grow in a fast-expanding company
* Health and Wellness: We offer a wellness grant to cover your gym/yoga/massage costs, as well as daily office breakfasts.
* Work with the biggest games: Work with some of the biggest games in the industry such as Fifa, Fortnite, Call of Duty, WoW and many more.
* Gaming Stations at work: Enjoy playing the games you work with daily, or just unwind with your personal favorites.

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
**About Sleip**


Sleip provides the world’s most advanced computer vision software for biomechanical motion quantification and measurements, specializing in Equine Gait Analysis.


Our scientifically validated AI model processes video recordings to extract detailed movement patterns, which greatly helps to identify, assess, diagnose and monitor lameness in horses. Our primary customers are equine veterinary practices across the world who are rapidly adopting the Sleip technology and product.  

  

  

  

**The role**  

  

We are looking for a full time Senior Backend Developer to join our team. The role is based on site at the HQ in Stockholm. As a Senior Backend Developer at Sleip, you'll be involved in shaping the architecture of our backend services while also getting hands-on with cutting-edge cloud technologies like Kubernetes, GPUs, and Cloud Run. This role offers a unique mix of building customer-facing features and architecting scalable systems from the ground up. You’ll work on reducing cloud costs, optimizing performance, and delivering impactful features—all while collaborating closely with the product team to drive innovation.


This role is ideal for you if you thrive at the intersection of backend development and cloud infrastructure or if you're eager to grow your skills in both domains.

 **Key Responsibilities**

* Architect and evolve our backend services, ensuring they scale efficiently while maintaining performance.
* Collaborate with product teams to build and deploy customer-facing features.
* Leverage cloud infrastructure (GCP, Kubernetes, GPUs, Cloud Run) to implement robust solutions.
* Continuously optimize systems for cost-efficiency and performance.
* Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines to ensure seamless deployments.
  

  

**Who you are**

  

* Pragmatic, preferring to enhance systems step by step, but you’re open to a bigger overhaul when it’s the right call.
* Comfortable working autonomously, taking ownership of complex projects from start to finish, and driving them forward while balancing both technical and product needs.
* Adaptable and collaborative, you thrive in a small team environment, effectively communicating ideas and gathering requirements in a not always formal setting.
* Fluent in English, both spoken and written, ensuring clear communication with the team and stakeholders.

Resilient and proactive – able to maintain a clear direction and keep projects on track, even when facing unexpected challenges.  
* 

**What you’ll bring**

  

* Deep experience with Node.js and TypeScript, with a focus on building scalable backend APIs.
* Strong knowledge of Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services, particularly Firebase, Firestore, GKE, Cloud Run, and PubSub.
* Hands-on experience with Terraform for infrastructure as code and cloud automation.
  

  

**Nice-to-haves**

  

* Experience with either Python, FRP and Ansible is a plus.
* Having previously worked in an entrepreneurial/start-up environment.

  

**Application**


We cannot accept applications via email due to GDPR. Please apply by clicking the 'Apply' button, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible. We apply continuous selection, so the position may be filled before the application deadline. Don’t wait too long to submit your application!

  

We’re looking forward to getting to know you!

 **Good to know**


Applications are reviewed on a continuous basis. For questions about the role, contact hiring manager Max Grundell, max@sleip.com. For questions about the recruitment process, contact Stina Hauschildt, stina@easyhr.se. Interviews are done on a continuing basis.

title: Front-end utvecklare
description:
Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär inom teknologins framkant? Vi söker nu dig med programmeringsintresse och som har en vilja att lära dig nya saker inom applikationsutveckling för AI Databas och Radarplattformar.

**Om företaget:**


Vår kund är ett ledande teknikkonsultbolag som arbetar genom hela utvecklingscykeln – från systemering, arkitektur och design till implementation och verifiering. Här kombineras djup teknisk expertis med glädje och en trivsam arbetsmiljö. Företaget verkar globalt med huvudkontor i Sverige och spelar en avgörande roll i att stärka flera nationers försvarsförmåga. Som konsult får du möjlighet att arbeta inom olika branscher som industri, försvar, medtech, fordon och telekom.


Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Futuria People men du kommer anställas direkt hos kund.

**Om rollen:**


Rollen som mjukvaruutvecklare fokuserar på front-end utveckling för en AI-driven databas och en dynamisk radarplattform. Du kommer att vara en del av ett större internationellt team, vilket innebär att vissa tjänsteresor utomlands kan förekomma. Programmeringen sker främst i Python, React och Golang, i en Linux-miljö med Kubernetes.


Du kommer att arbeta nära dina kollegor i teamet och tillsammans ta ansvar för leveranser, planering och problemlösning.

**Du erbjuds:**

* **Spännande projekt:** Bredden av både branscher och tekniker ger dig möjlighet att delta i mångsidiga uppdrag med fokus på hållbara och säkra lösningar.
* **Skräddarsydda roller:** Tack vare företagets omfattande kundbas kan din roll anpassas efter dina kunskaper, intressen och mål.
* **Karriärutveckling:** Möjligheter att kliva in i nya roller, exempelvis som Teamledare, när du är redo.
* **Hållbar arbetsmiljö:** Ett företag som prioriterar balans mellan arbete och privatliv, med fokus på långsiktig utveckling.

**Vi ser gärna att du:**


För att trivas och utvecklas i rollen söker vi dig som motiveras av att lösa problem tillsammans med andra. Du uppskattar att arbeta tillsammans i team. Vi tror även att du har en analytisk förmåga och en medvetenhet för kvalitet.

* Erfarenhet av programmeringsspråken React, Golang och Kubernetes.
* Akademisk examen i Data, Elektro, Mekatronik, Systemvetare eller motsvarande.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska obehindrat i tal och skrift. Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav.
* Positivt inställd till att resa i jobbet.

**Övrig information**

* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Placering: Göteborg
* Eventuella frågor besvaras av rekryteringskonsult Ebba Strömberg:
* ebba.stromberg@futuriapeople.se


Passar det här in på dig eller känner du någon som skulle passa bättre för jobbet? - Tipsa gärna!


Intervjuer sker löpande, välkommen med din ansökan idag!

***Futuria People*** *är rekryteringsföretaget som hjälper individer att ta nästa steg i sin karriär och företag att attrahera nya medarbetare. Genom uppsökande rekrytering och kvalitativ annonsering har vi hjälpt hundratals kandidater till ett nytt jobb och en mer stimulerande vardag.*

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Frontend Developer**
----------------------

**About Wehype:**


At Wehype, we empower creators and game publishers to thrive through creator collaborations. Our platform has facilitated over 20,000 successful activations globally, including paid sponsorships, Support A Creator Codes, and exclusive giveaways, driving millions of impressions and boosting brand engagement. We work with some of the world’s biggest publishers, such as Tencent, Blizzard, and Supercell, to create impactful campaigns that connect creators with games on a global scale.

**Play your part in our team's succeeding**


We're seeking a hungry, energetic, and proactive Frontend Developer who loves to make things happen. You thrive on exploring the latest technologies, leveraging AI to accelerate results, and experimenting with your own projects.

  

As a Frontend Developer at Wehype, you will be instrumental in delivering engaging and intuitive user experiences using SvelteKit and other modern technologies. Working within one of our cross-functional teams, you will contribute to designing, developing, and optimizing the frontend of our platform, ensuring it meets the needs of creators and game publishers worldwide. You will collaborate closely with designers, and backend developers to bring our vision to life and help shape the future of our platform.

##### **What you'll do:**

* Develop and maintain user-facing features using SvelteKit and other modern frontend technologies.
* Work closely with backend developers to integrate APIs
* Optimize application performance and scalability to support our growing user base.
* Collaborate in the product development process, from brainstorming ideas to implementing new features
* Ensure a high level of quality by adhering to best practices and contributing to code reviews.

##### **What we're looking for:**

* Frontend expertise: Experience with modern JavaScript frameworks, particularly SvelteKit.
* UI/UX passion: A strong focus on creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces.
* Collaborative mindset: Excellent problem-solving and communication skills, with the ability to thrive in a team environment.
* Product-focused development: Familiarity with agile product development, from ideation to deployment and iteration.
* Performance optimization: Knowledge of best practices in frontend performance and application scalability.

##### **Nice-to-haves:**

* Familiarity with GraphQL and modern API consumption patterns.
* Experience with DevOps tools and automated testing workflows.
* Knowledge of .NET environments and backend integration.
* Experience from cloud platforms like AWS

##### **What’s in it for you?**

* Growth Opportunities: Learn as part of a collaborative team and grow in a fast-expanding company
* Health and Wellness: We offer a wellness grant to cover your gym/yoga/massage costs, as well as daily office breakfasts.
* Work with the biggest games: Work with some of the biggest games in the industry such as Fifa, Fortnite, Call of Duty, WoW and many more.
* Gaming Stations at work: Enjoy playing the games you work with daily, or just unwind with your personal favorites.

title: Javautvecklare
description:
Är du redo för ett nytt steg i karriären? Hos oss får du chansen att arbeta med det vi älskar Problemlösning


I takt med att digitaliseringen blir allt viktigare i samhället och hos våra kunder så ökar även Rejlers sitt fokus på digitala tjänster inom IT och Systemutveckling. Vi önskar oss nu fler kollegor med fokus inom java-utveckling till vårt affärsområde Digital Solutions för att bidra till samt driva innovation och digitalisering. Tillsammans med våra kunder arbetar vi med spännande projekt inom bland annat AI, IoT, RPA, 5G och VR/AR.

**ABOUT THE JOB**
-----------------


Som konsult inom Java-utveckling blir din huvudsakliga uppgift att arbeta med att skapa lösningar åt våra kunder. Vilket projekt som passar dig bäst avgörs utifrån din kompetens och ditt intresse! Över tid kommer du att arbeta i olika projekt som kan ha inriktning på olika kompetensområden och branscher där du bidrar till att lösa tekniska utmaningar. Du ingår i ett team som strävar efter att leverera högkvalitativa lösningar och samtidigt lära av varandra och utvecklas tillsammans. Det finns därmed stort utrymme för kontinuerligt lärande och kunskapsutbyte både i dina uppdrag och i samarbete med dina kollegor. **#HomeOfTheLearningMinds**

**WHO ARE YOU?**
----------------


Dina personliga egenskaper väger tungt hos oss, vi värdesätter **initiativtagande**, **nyfikenhet**, **samarbetsförmåga** **och ödmjukhet**. Du vill gärna **vara med och påverka** och tycker om att **ta eget ansvar** och **brinner för att skapa nya affärsmöjligheter.** Vi söker både dig som är några år in i karriären och dig med gedigen erfarenhet inom **java-utveckling**. Din grund har du i en akademisk **utbildning inom data/systemutveckling**, under din arbetslivserfarenhet har du fått god kunskap och erfarenhet inom utveckling i olika språk och utvecklingsmiljöer. ‍


Har du arbetat med **molntjänster**, **moderna ramverk, containeriserade miljöer** eller **mikrotjänster**? - Då tror vi att det här kan vara helt rätt jobb för dig! Våra uppdrag kräver att du har förmåga att kommunicera obehindrat på både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


Skulle du dessutom ha erfarenhet av arbete inom **energibranschen** ser vi det som ett stort plus!

**WHAT YOU GET**
----------------


På Rejlers värnar vi om våra medarbetare och engagerar oss för att skapa ett så bra arbetsklimat som möjligt för att du som anställd ska trivas och utvecklas. Ett kvitto på att det stämmer är att vi under flera år i rad blivit vald till en av Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare️**#PeopleFirst**


Förutom ovan får du även ett gäng härliga kollegor som bidrar till **#fun@work** och en arbetsplats som erbjuder bra balans mellan jobb och fritid och en god ledare i **Malin** som tror på att eget ansvar, tillit och att öppenhet får människor att växa.


Hos oss får du vara IT-konsult i ett samhällsbyggarbolag, vilket innebär att du får vara med och digitalisera Sverige. Kan det bli bättre? Du kommer tillhöra ett team av programmerare med ett brett spektra av kompetenser. Här gillar vi att bjuda på oss själva och delar gärna med oss av våra erfarenheter.


Ta chansen och sök till oss redan idag!

 **Under julledigheten kan det dröja lite längre innan du får återkoppling från oss. Vi uppskattar ditt tålamod och hoppas att du får en fantastisk helgperiod!**

 *Som ett kvalitativt led i våra rekryteringsprocesser kommer en bakgrundskontroll genomföras på slutkandidaten. Vissa roller kräver även annan kontroll, såsom t.ex. säkerhetsprövning, innan uppdrag hos vissa kunder - om det är aktuellt för tjänsten du sökt så kommer du att få mer information kring det i ett senare skede. Ytterligare information hittar du även här:*  

Behandling av personuppgifter | Rejlers  

*Vi granskar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan komma att bli tillsatt innan sista ansökningsdag.*

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare till UMS Skeldar i Linköping
description:
###### **UMS Skeldar, ett****mångfacetterat företag,****med förmågor inom forskning, utveckling, design, tillverkning, testning, utbildning, konsultande, underhåll och mycket mer. Vi utvecklar en av världens mest avancerade****Unmanned Aerial Vehicle****. Bli en del av vårt växande team!**


Du blir del av teamet System & Software som består ca 25 medarbetare i roller som teamledare, systemingenjörer, mjukvaruutvecklare och testare. Teamet jobbar tvärfunktionellt och med alla tre delar i helikoptersystemet: Helikopter, Markstation och Simulatorn.


I rollen som mjukvaruutvecklare har du möjlighet att:

* Programmera i hela eller delar av systemet;
* + Markstationen, som används för planering och genomförande av uppdrag med systemet, är till större delen utvecklad i .NET C# och WPF.
	+ Simulatorn, som används för att testköra funktionalitet med hjälp av simulerade helikopterkörningar, är utvecklad i C++.
	+ I helikoptern sker utvecklingen i C++.
* Utveckla nya funktioner som inkluderar design och implementation av mjukvara.
* Utveckla automatiska testfall.
* Arbeta med underhåll och förbättringsåtgärder av befintlig mjukvara.


Låter tjänsten intressant? Tveka inte att söka redan idag!

 **Är du den vi söker?**

Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och för att du ska trivas så bra som möjligt söker vi efter dig som har god samarbetsförmåga, är självgående och ansvarstagande.


För att lyckas i den här rollen ser vi att du har en högskole- eller universitetsutbildning inom relevant ingenjörsområde samt relevant arbetslivserfarenhet. Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av programmering i .NET C# och/eller C++. Erfarenhet inom flygverksamhet och kunskaper inom WPF är meriterande.


Tjänsten ställer krav på goda kunskaper i såväl engelska som svenska i tal och skrift.

**Vi erbjuder:**

* en unik möjlighet att vara med i ett snabbt växande företag.
* en dynamisk arbetsplats där ingen dag är den andra lik.
* en högteknologisk produkt som just nu ligger i framkant på marknaden.
* en familjär arbetskultur med högt i tak och högt engagemang.

**Ytterligare information:**

* Arbetsplats: Linköping.
* Tjänstgöringsgrad: Heltid.
* Start: Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid.


För en anställning hos oss på UMS Skeldar krävs att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. Roller där vi har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.


Vi behandlar ansökningar löpande. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!


Key words: *Software Engineer, Engineer, Mjukvaruutvecklare, Software Design Engineer*

title: Lösningsarkitekt / Utvecklare
description:
Vi brinner för att skapa lösningar som hjälper våra kunder att digitalisera säkert. Här är nu chansen för dig som drivs av att arbeta med kunder och programutveckling.


Vill du liksom oss växa med våra kunder, medarbetare och produkter, i kombination med att du har kul på jobbet? Då är drömjobbet ute nu!


**Om rollen**


I rollen som lösningsarkitekt och utvecklare arbetar du med våra produkter inom integration, säkerhet och e-tjänster som levereras till kunder i Norden. Du kommer att arbeta både med leveransteam och utvecklingsteam där alla stöttar varandra.


Du bör ha relevant utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande kunskaper förvärvade på annat sätt. En eller flera av följande kunskaper är meriterande:


* Kunskap och erfarenhet av att skapa lösningsförslag
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av automatiserade tester
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av att dokumentera tekniska lösningar
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av att programmera Python, C/C++ eller Java
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av LDAP, SOAP, SQL, XML, JSON och HTTP

**Vem är du?**


I denna tjänst är din utbildningsbakgrund inte det viktigaste, men du är tekniskt intresserad och brinner för att lära dig nya saker.


**Vi** erbjuder


* 30 dagars betald semester
* Flexibel vardag och hybridarbete
* Friskvård 4 000 kr/år
* Ta del av twodays interna kontaktnätverk med över 2 200+ IT-kompetenser inom hela Norden.
* Möjlighet att gå med i twodays investeringsprogram (TOP)

**Ansökan**


Låter det som den perfekta rollen för dig? Vänta inte med att skicka in ditt CV och personliga brev. Har du några frågor om tjänsten så tveka inte på att höra av dig till


Support och leveranschef Christian Nilsson på christian.nilsson@twoday.com eller


Produktområdeschef Erling Sjöström på erling.sjostrom@twoday.com


**Varför** twoday?


Medarbetaren i centrum


twoday är en flexibel arbetsplats med varierande arbetsuppgifter och stort utrymme att utvecklas. Vårt främsta mål är att du som medarbetare kan arbeta i miljö som är trivsam, innovativ, och framförallt - rolig!


Hos oss hittar du ett väl sammansvetsat flexibelt gäng som hjälper varandra och våra kunder att nå framgång varje dag. Med mer än 2 900 anställda arbetar vi för att skapa en bättre morgondag, som ger mervärde för oss som människor och samhället som helhet. Vi tror att med rätt medarbetare och högteknologiska lösningar kan vi skapa en tydligare bild av var vi är just nu – och var vi kommer vara imorgon.


**Mångfald & Inkludering**


Möter du inte varje krav? Studier har visat att kvinnor och andra underrepresenterade grupper är mindre benägna att ansöka till ett jobb om dom inte möter varje kvalifikation. På twoday är vi dedikerade att bygga en arbetsplats som genomsyras av mångfald och inkludering. Om du är exalterad över denna roll men din tidigare erfarenhet inte matchar till hundra procent mot arbetsbeskrivningen, så uppmanar vi dig att ansöka ändå.

title: Fullstack Developer to Web Manuals
description:
At Web Manuals, we’re redefining aviation with our state-of-the-art SaaS solutions. Our mission? To revolutionize how aviation professionals work while reaching new heights of innovation and service. As a bootstrapped company, we chart our own course, breaking barriers and setting our sights on the stars and beyond. We’re proud to offer an environment where you can soar—both professionally and personally—and explore a world of opportunities within an international team.


With offices in Malmö (HQ), San Diego, New York, and Singapore, we’re growing rapidly. Now, we’re on the hunt for a **Fullstack Developer** to join our dynamic team in Malmö! *Take the leap and join Web Manuals on our journey to revolutionize aviation—apply today!*

### **About the role**


As a Fullstack Developer at Web Manuals, you’ll be part of our dedicated Development Team, working closely with and reporting to our Director of Engineering. The team includes experienced Senior Developers, Fullstack Developers, a Software Testing team, and a System Administrator. Together, we collaborate daily in a supportive, fast-paced environment, following the kanban-model for agile development.

### **Your key responsibilities**

* Design, implement, and maintain high-performance, scalable, and reliable Java applications.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
* Ensure code quality through code reviews, unit testing, and continuous integration.
* Identify and address performance bottlenecks, bugs, and other issues.
* Document own code and participate in all development processes.

### **What we're looking for**

* Minimum bachelor's degree within software development, alternatively experience that are considered equivalent.
* A few years of professional web development experience.
* Excellent knowledge of Java and JavaScript/typescript languages.
* Excellent communication skills in English, as it is our corporate language.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Experience working with Angular framework and/or SQL databases is a plus.
* Attention to detail.
* A strong work ethic.
* Motivation to tackle challenges head-on.
* A curious, forward-thinking approach to innovation.
* A collaborative spirit and team-oriented attitude.

### **Other information**

* Start date: March (flexible)
* Location: Malmö
* Work extent: Full-time
* As part of our recruitment process, we use the Predictive Index (PI) assessment to ensure a great fit between your skills and our company culture. A criminal record check will also be conducted during the final stage, in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.


Curious about what it’s like to work at Web Manuals? Check out our new Instagram account and visit our About us page!

title: Senior Power Platform Developer
description:
Vill du vara med och skapa innovativa lösningar för framtiden? Är du en erfaren utvecklare med passion för Power Platform och Microsofts ekosystem? Fujitsu söker nu en Senior Power Platform Developer med fokus på Power Apps, Power Automate och Copilot Studio. Här får du möjligheten att arbeta i ett team som genomsyras av samarbete, kreativitet och expertis.


Du kommer att ingå i ett härligt, dynamiskt team där alla våra medarbetare är specialister inom sina områden. Det är viktigt att du gillar att arbeta i projekt, tillsammans med kollegor och uppdragsgivare mot gemensamma mål.
  

  

**Som Senior Power Platform Developer kommer du att:**

* Vara med i kunddialoger och genomföra workshops och utbildningar.
* Designa, planera och utveckla avancerade lösningar i Power Apps, Power Automate och Copilot Studio.
* Utveckla Canvas och Model Driven Apps för skräddarsydda affärsbehov.
* Skapa integrationslösningar mellan Microsoft Stack-verktyg (M365, SQL, Dataverse, Azure Data Lakes, Azure Blob) och externa system (ERP, SAP, API:er).
* Bygga custom connectors, cloud flows och desktop flows, samt utveckla lösningar med Copilot Studio-agenter.
**För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du har:**

* 3-5 års erfarenhet som konsult och utvecklare inom IT-industrin med fokus på MS Power Platform.
* Erfarenhet av att bygga Canvas och Model Driven Apps
* Erfarenhet av att jobba med integrations mot olika Microsoft Stack verktyg såsom M365, SQL, Dataverse, Azure Date Lakes, Azure Blob
* Erfarenhet av att jobba med integrations med olika externa system såsom ERP, SAP, API:er
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla Custom connectos
* Erfarenhet av att bygga Cloud flows och Desktop flows, Copilot Studio agenter
* Muntliga och skriftliga kunskaper i svenska och engelska
* Erfarenhet av att jobba med Power Platform governance, DLP policies och Center of Excellence starter kit är meriterande
**Start och placering:** Sverige, enligt överenskommelse.


**Vilka är Fujitsu?**

Fujitsu är ett världsledande japanskt företag inom IT och kommunikation. Vår marknad bygger på närhet till våra lokala kunder samtidigt som vi har det globala Fujitsu i ryggen. Det ger oss möjlighet att erbjuda alla våra kunder en bred palett av kreativa lösningar samtidigt som det ger oss de rätta verktygen att vara en föregångare inom innovation. Fujitsu erbjuder en komplett portfölj av tjänster, lösningar och produkter – vi är en global partner i den digitala transformationen.


**Vad kan vi erbjuda?**

Som medarbetare hos Fujitsu möter du ny och spännande teknik. Artificiell intelligens, IoT, Big Data, Hybrid IT och mycket mer. Vi erbjuder en hybrid arbetsmiljö med flextider där du får frihet under ansvar att själv lägga upp ditt arbete. Utöver det får du vara en del av en inkluderande kultur med stark sammanhållning samtidigt som du får se bortom tekniken och fokusera på den konkreta nyttan för våra kunder, för samhället och för miljön.
company_description: Fujitsu is a leading Japanese information & communication technology company, offering a range of technology products, solutions & services.

title: Product Developer / CAD Engineer
description:
**CAD Engineer / Product developer for High-Tech Products**

Are you a skilled and passionate Product developer / CAD engineer looking for a stimulating and diverse area of work? If so, NYFORS invites you to join our team of development engineers, mechanical engineers, and physicists dedicated to developing high-tech fiber processing equipment.


**THE TEAM**


We are a skillful and passionate team with high competence in our area. The team includes development engineers, mechanical engineers and physicists all dedicated to developing new innovative, high-tech products and systems for fiber optic appplications.


We think it’s exciting to see all parts come together, software and hardware, and see the end products be successfully used by our customers.


**THE POSITION**


As a CAD engineer, you will have the opportunity to mix theory with practice and be responsible for evolving NYFORS' current product portfolio and developing completely new products.


We work in SolidWorks and are looking for a civil engineer with a technical interest and a high sense of responsibility. The role requires accuracy and focus on results, and you should feel confident in your professional role, as you should be able to work independently.


The work at NYFORS is cross-border and dynamic, and you will have the opportunity to work broadly and simultaneously both theoretically and practically. It is also an advantage if you have experience with various manufacturing processes.

**YOUR BACKGROUND**


Ideally, you have worked as a CAD engineer for at least two-five years, with experience from different industries and insight into different manufacturing methods. Even younger engineers with the right profile have the opportunity for employment.


**WE CAN OFFER**


At NYFORS, we offer versatile and stimulating work with the opportunity to develop and broaden your knowledge and skills. You will work in bright and pleasant premises at our head office in Skrubba, Stockholm, and we encourage a healthy work-life balance by offering our employees flexible working hours.


We value diversity highly and have employees from five different countries. Our goal is to create a long-term, rewarding, and fun collaboration together with you.


**APPLICATION**


If you are interested in this exciting opportunity, please submit your application as soon as possible. We will conduct interviews on an ongoing basis, so please apply as soon as you can. However, the final application deadline is March 15, 2025. Your application should include your CV and a personal letter where you tell us more about who you are and how you can contribute to this role and to NYFORS as a company.


**ABOUT NYFORS**


NYFORS is an innovative company moving at the fore-front of technology. As such we are looking for top applicants and strongly believe in investing in our employees. We encourage all our employees to develop the skills they are most interested in while working here. Our people are our strongest asset and what enables NYFORS’ continued success. Here you will get the opportunity to work with modern, high-tech equipment with dedicated co-workers.

title: System Developer
description:
**Who We Are And What We Do**
 At Viedoc, we design engaging software that modernizes clinical research so that necessary treatments can reach the people who need them faster.
   

  

 We accomplish this by combining technology and a creative design to streamline, automate and simplify conventional processes within clinical research. Simply put, Viedoc makes every aspect of a clinical study a bit smoother, resulting in greater discoveries that make a difference, and has the potential to improve lives.
   

  

 Real change means challenging the status quo – our driving force since we started almost two decades ago. In everything we do, we work for a healthier world, searching for better, more efficient solutions that answer to the needs of both our users and humanity.
   

  

**What You Will Do And Why**
 As a Software Developer, you will be part of an enthusiastic and close-knit team with other developers, product owners, and testers, whose ambition is to constantly develop the product and themselves. Together with your team, you will work with everything from product discovery to architecture-related issues. You will work agile and put information security and quality first.Our Tech Stack includes .NET, C#, JavaScript/React, Azure, Docker, and Serverless.
   

  

**This Means You Will Be Responsible For**
* Collaborating with developers, product owners, and testers to deliver high-quality software solutions.
* Participating in all stages of development, from product discovery to deployment and maintenance.
* Ensuring information security and quality are prioritized throughout the development process.
* Contributing to system architecture decisions and addressing performance and scalability challenges.
* Working in an agile team, participating in sprints, stand-ups, and continuous improvement processes.


**Who are you?**
**About**
 We believe that you are passionate about software development. You love sharing your knowledge and want to celebrate both the small and the groundbreaking product breakthroughs with us. We also want you to have:
   

  

* At least 3-5 years of experience within software development
* Good knowledge of and experience in .NET/C#, JavaScript, and cloud technology
* Relevant education within IT or equivalent work experience
* Fluent in English, both speech and writing


**Why you should work at** 
**Viedoc**
* Be a part of a company that is at the forefront of utilizing technology to make the world a better place by improving clinical trials
* Ability to work flexible hours and hybrid remote
* Clearly defined development plans that allow you to grow
* The chance to work in the coolest office in Uppsala right by the central station


**Interested?**
 If you want to join our team, apply! Want to know more about why our product is important?
 **Check out the video on this page**

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Development at Nolimit City (part of Evolution AB) is a challenging and exciting role where you will be part of a team dedicated to creating solutions that redefine our industry. By working in small, highly collaborative teams, you and your team will have clear ownership of one of our most important new initiatives.
   

  

 At Nolimit City, we optimize for quality, fast flows, and iterative development with short feedback loops. We have a strong focus on end-to-end ownership, continuous improvement, monitoring, and experimentation. We strive to have teams that are inclusive, helpful, and have a strong sense of ownership for what they build. Our engineers make some of the most significant decisions for the company, and we are looking for open and curious developers. As part of the Nolimit City team, you will be part of one of Sweden's fastest-growing companies and contribute to creating value for our players worldwide.
   

  

 We are expanding several of our engineering teams, including the team working on new initiatives with innovative products for our end users and work on our core products.
   

  

 Although we prefer that you're working on-site we also undertand that you have a life outside of work, meaning that working remote from time to time, leaving early, coming in late etc is not something unusual for us. A bit of a cliche; but we do in fact offer a great deal of freedom but with that comes responsibility.
   

  

 What you'll do
   

  

* Own the product from start to finish. Decide how it is best built, tested, deployed, and monitored.
* Work with large-scale, highly available, and robust modern systems.
* Be an integral part of a team and its culture and ways of working.
* Work with automated deployment enabling release multiple times a day.
* Succeed, fail, and learn together with other competent and talented people. We believe in an environment that offers growth opportunities and see education as a result of failure that brings us closer to the next breakthrough.
* Take responsibility for system design, work together with domain architects, own end-to-end problems, manage stakeholder communication, and mentor junior engineers.


 Who you are
   

  

* Tech stack should include: JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js, React, Java.
* Experience with advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks
* Experience with APIs and product development
* A passion for writing clear and sustainable code
* Experience with agile methodologies, continuous integration, continuous delivery
* Good spoken and written English skills
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and takes ownership of the change from editor to production system
* We understand that you might not have experience in all the areas listed above, but as long as you have the ambition and willingness to learn we would like to hear from you.


 Some of our technologies
   

  

* Javascript / TypeScript
* React / NextJS
* Redux / Redux-Toolkit Query
* Strapi (Headless CMS)
* Node.js and Express.js
* Java 17, Dropwizard
* MySQL
* PostgreSQL
* AWS, Ubuntu, Docker, GitHub Actions


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Java Software Engineer (R-17098)
description:
**Why We Work at Dun & Bradstreet**
 Dun & Bradstreet combines global data and local expertise to help clients make smarter decisions. With 6,000+ people in 31 countries, we are a team of diverse thinkers and problem solvers who all share a common curiosity: to find new ways to turn data into value. If you share this curiosity and want to be part of a future-ready company, come join us! Learn more at dnb.com/careers .
   

  

 The Consumer Intelligence team is looking for a Software Developer, responsible for delivering smart data that help our customers make the right decisions.
   

  

 As part of the team, you will get the chance to provide platform components to deliver user facing experiences to consumers. We work closely with our customers to make sure we develop and build the right things.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Collaborate with a small, autonomous team of developers, and product owners to find end-to-end solutions to important problems.
* Implement these solutions in a microservice environment, built mostly on Kotlin and Spring Boot
* We work towards an architecture based on micro-services and REST APIs and with modern frameworks and technologies such as Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, ElasticSearch, MongoDB, Kafka, Docker and Kubernetes in AWS.
* Develop software that aims to meet the business goals and visions
* Ensure delivery of services that meet performance, scalability and robustness requirements
* Unit and integration tests for code and services produced
* Take part in the overall strategy for IT development


**Your Passion**
* You are passionate about development and being part of a real agile Tech organization. Our developers have great responsibility to participate and drive our products and services forward with high-end technology and customer experience. We work in product teams, in short sprints and with Continuous Deployment. We also work cross functional and cooperative across all the organization to manage and move towards our technical vision and platform to align in the future.
* Being part of our Tech organization, you are a social team player, curious and explorative, and want to take part in continuously improve the way we work and evaluating tools in the scope of open source and larger communities to best support our needs and vision.


**Who You Are**
* You hold a degree in computer science or similar subject and have at least 2+ years of working experience in similar engineering position
* You have an understanding of Java or Kotlin development
* Previous coding experience in object oriented or functional programming
* You care about quality and you know what it means to ship high-quality code
* You have some knowledge of distributed systems, and be passionate about pair programming practices and agile way of working
* You have strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* You are fluent in spoken and written Swedish and English


**Why Join Us?**
**Benefits**
 Does this role sound like a great opportunity but you’re not sure about making a move? We are really proud of our company and culture and think we have some great things to offer. Some of our benefits in Sweden include:
   

  

* Two paid volunteer days to contribute to causes in your community
* A paid day every year to use for your health and wellness
* Instead of half days before public holidays, you will have 4 additional full days a year for you to use to celebrate what is meaningful to you
* Annual wellness/sport benefit
* Collective agreement, pension, insurance and parental pay allowance
* Access to free services providing support and counselling
* Flexible working arrangements and hybrid work arrangement for most roles


***Whilst some roles do have certain requirements which are essential, we try to focus on hiring based on potential rather than CV as much as possible. If you are unsure you fully meet the requirements, we would still love to hear from you!***
 All Dun & Bradstreet job postings can be found at https://www.dnb.com/about-us/careers-and-people/joblistings.html and https://jobs.lever.co/dnb . Official communication from Dun & Bradstreet will come from an email address ending in @dnb.com.
   

  

 Notice to Applicants : Please be advised that this job posting page is hosted and powered by Lever. Your use of this page is subject to Lever's Privacy Notice and Cookie Policy , which governs the processing of visitor data on this platform.

title: Infrastructure Engineer
description:
In this role, you will:
   

  

* Be the backbone of our ambitious goals, ensuring our infrastructure is robust and scalable
* Support feature development teams with infrastructure decisions and deployments.
* Act as Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) and continuously enhance our Developer Experience (DX).


 Your background looks something like:
   

  

* Proficiency in both backend engineering and cloud-based deployments.
* Experience with highly available, scalable, and extensible backend systems.
* Proficiency in GCP, and Kubernetes.


**What We Offer**
* Career development opportunities in a rapidly evolving entrepreneurial environment.
* Direct collaboration with senior leadership and the opportunity to directly impact company growth and strategy.
* A collaborative, high-energy team environment where your ideas and contributions are valued and implemented.
* Competitive salary complemented with a transparent and highly competitive options program.
* Centrally located offices in NYC, London, and Stockholm, designed as a space for you to do your life's work.


**About Sana**
 Sana exists to advance how humans access knowledge with artificial intelligence. Our AI products are trusted by the world’s most pioneering companies—from Polestar and Merck to Hinge Health and Svea Solar—and have served 1 million people worldwide.
   

  

 Sana has raised over $130m to date from world-leading investors including NEA, Menlo Ventures, and EQT Ventures. We have been featured as a LinkedIn Top Startup, named a winner in the AI and Data category for Fast Company’s 2024 Next Big Things in Tech, and recognized on the Forbes AI 50 list as one of the top AI companies developing the most promising business use cases of artificial intelligence.
   

  

 We believe advancing knowledge is the world’s most important problem to solve. From writing and the printing press to the internet and Google, the tools that have accelerated access to knowledge have defined human progress. Yet our workplace software hasn’t kept up. We’re building towards a world where knowledge is not only more accessible, but empowers you to accomplish more than you ever thought possible.
   

  

 If that’s a future that excites you, you’re in the right place. Come and do your life’s work with us.
